data.text: @COVIDnewsfast @fitterhappierAJ Sorry but can’t find link to full paper.   I can search for it, but trying the lazy route first

@Reigna_Saraya @RajlabN @JoePajak @COVIDnewsfast @ArkansasState And it's so frustrating - every time things start to look a little better, here in the US, they rush to drop all mandates, bring everyone back into the office, etc - which of course leads to yet another surge. Just plain insanity.
@perpetualmystik @RajlabN @JoePajak @COVIDnewsfast @ArkansasState Looks like it’s going to be bad indeed😬

@Reigna_Saraya @RajlabN @JoePajak @COVIDnewsfast @ArkansasState Cool, I thought so - thank you 🙏 No science at all behind this statement, please don't flame me - but that one gives me weird vibes, the numerology 😬
@RajlabN @JoePajak @COVIDnewsfast @ArkansasState So are they referring to the BA.2 with I1221T as BA.2.2 then? Or does that refer to something else?

@RajlabN @JoePajak @COVIDnewsfast @ArkansasState Our gov have stopped everything.  We have no public health going on, they aren’t tracking it. Hospitals are already struggling. How the hell do we track BA2.2??
@RajlabN @JoePajak @COVIDnewsfast @ArkansasState That mutation in spike is now at 100% in HK...looking quite serious to me.
